prompt:
Product Name: Extensible Twill Cargo Pocket Short Beige
Audience: Parents of a 5 year old boy
completion: With side cargo pockets and back flaps, these are the shorts he'll want to wear over and over again this spring and summer. Our extensible Twill Cargo Pocket Short Beige is made from a cotton/nylon/elastane blend and feature a extensible fit with a drawstring waist, slant front pockets, flap cargo pockets, and flap pockets on the back.
